profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-10 19:26:28 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

did.abstract: This collections contains the papers of Downing Cless, professor in the Department of Drama.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into three series: Course materials, correspondence and publications; Productions; and 2017 accessions.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Downing Cless joined the Department of Drama at Tufts University in 1979. Downing began as a junior faculty member, then became an associate professor three years later. He later became Professor of Drama, and served as department chair for two terms, for six years and again for three. Downing retired in May 2014.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Downing Cless Papers, 1962-2014. Tufts University. Digital Collections and Archives. Medford, MA.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed by Liz Francis, Records Archivist, in Fall 2014. 2017 and 2019 accessions processed by Leah Edelman in 2017 amd 2019. Materials were placed in archival boxes and folders, and the folder-level inventory, series-level descriptions, and finding aid were updated at the time of processing.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains files and set drawings on productions directed by or involving Downing Cless. This collection also contains course and curriculum material related to Stage Left and TheaterWorks. Materials include correspondence, research materials, writings, scripts, programs, director's notes, and photographs.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. Any intellectual property rights that the donor possesses have been retained by the donor during his lifetime. Requests for reproduction must be referred to the donor.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains course and curriculum materials, correspondence, notes, departmental business, files related to Stage Left and TheaterWorks, and research and writings materials.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged in its original order, as created by Downing Cless.

did.unittitle: Resolution on the Retirement of Downing Cless
Course file for Drama 155: Directing I

acqinfo.p: Gift of Downing Cless, 2016, accession MS-2017-019.

scopecontent.p: This folder includes syllabus, assignments, and notes.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This file contains a project plan for Cless's research leave 2013-2014, research material, a paper presented at the American Society for Theater Research conference (2010), and a CDC paper. Topics include climater change and theater.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Downing Cless, 2019, accession MS-2019-072.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This file contains programs, notes, and correspondence relating to SILA, presented by the Underground Railway Theater at Central Square Theater in 2014.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains files on individual productions directed by Downing Cless,1969-2011. Files typically contain scripts, programs, director's notes, correspondence, news clippings, and photographs.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged chronologically, with a few exceptions, as arranged by Downing Cless.

did.unittitle: You Can't Take it with You
The Year Boston Won the Pennant

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged in received order.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This series is open for research.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred by Downing Cless, 2017, accession MS-2018-013.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains hand-drawn set and lighting designs for the following productions: Lion in Winter, 1980; Jest!, 1979; Loot, 1981; Major Barbara, 1980; The Knight of the Burning Pestle, 1978; R, 1978; Summit Conference, 1981; Toys in the Attic, 1981; Diary of Anne Frank, 1978; Cat on a Hot Tin Roof, 1979; Camino Real, 1980; A Fable, 1978; The Ghost Sonata, 1978; The Haunted House, 1979.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This file contains hand-drawn set and lighting designs for the following productions: Lion in Winter, 1980; Jest!, 1979; Loot, 1981; Major Barbara, 1980; The Knight of the Burning Pestle, 1978; R, 1978; Summit Conference, 1981; Toys in the Attic, 1981; Diary of Anne Frank, 1978; Cat on a Hot Tin Roof, 1979; Camino Real, 1980; A Fable, 1978; The Ghost Sonata, 1978; The Haunted House, 1979.
